scenario_text.value:
*huff* *puff*...
Okay, I think I finally lost it.

Still, what the heck was that thing?
I’ve never seen anything like it...

But the really weird thing is, I wasn’t all
that scared of it...

(I mean, it was so small...and it talked like
a kid. Plus it was so buddy-buddy...)

(Heck, the fact that it talked at all is
weird enough on its own, right?!)
(Hmmm... Maybe I should look around more.)

(What the... Something is moving in the
grass!)

Holy—it’s that rock monster that attacked us
before?!

I can’t believe one was here! Damn, I can’t
get away, it’s too close!
